title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official CLI and Python/JS bindings for running large language models locally with minimal setup.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use Ollama models as drop-in LLM endpoints for chains, agents, and RAG.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official Node.js client for the Ollama server, offering promise-based APIs and TypeScript types.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client that wraps the Ollama REST API for chat, generate, and embedding calls.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama with chat history, model management, and multi-user support.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama providing fluent builders and reactive streams.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for integrating Ollama models into Rails or Sinatra apps.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into an inline coding assistant.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Kubernetes Helm chart for deploying Ollama server with GPU and PVC support.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (CPU & CUDA) with multi-arch support and one-line run commands.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration supplying Ollama generators and embedders for pipelines.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that lets servers chat with local models through slash commands.

title: ollama-cli-chat
summary: Terminal UI chat client built with Textual, featuring markdown and conversation save.

title: ollama-ts
summary: Lightweight TypeScript client generated from OpenAPI spec with full type coverage.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client library with context cancellation and streaming support.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot that answers questions using Ollama models and threads responses.

title: ollama-fastapi
summary: FastAPI wrapper adding OAuth, usage limits, and OpenAI-compatible endpoints to Ollama.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing async client and strongly-typed request/response models.

title: ollama-model-library
summary: Curated collection of custom Modelfiles for code, chat, and domain-specific fine-tunes.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with dependency-injection helpers and ASP.NET Core middleware.
